question: List enzymes that removes histone modifications.

snippets.text: , Lysine Specific Demethylases (LSD) removes methylated histone H3 lysine 4 (H3K4) and H3 lysine 9 (H3K9)
A family of enzymes, namely histone deacetylases (HDACs), removes these PTMs.
Histone deacetylases (HDACs), a specific epigenetic group of enzymes, dynamically and reversibly removes acetyl groups from histone tails projecting from the nucleosome.

exact_answer: Histone deacetylases, HDAC, Lysine Specific Demethylases, LSD
